attributes.birthPlace: Kadarbana village of Rajdevi vdc, Rautahat District, Nepal

description: Salma Khatoon Mikrani is a Nepalese politician who served as a Proportional Representative member of the first Constituent Assembly of Nepal from 2008 to 2013. She was the only representative of the Mikrani community in the Nepalese parliament. Throughout her career, she has been affiliated with several political parties, including the Madhesi Jana Adhikar Forum, Nepal, Madhesi Janaadhikar Forum, Republican, Terai Madhesh Loktantrik Party, and the Nepal Socialist Party. She was an active participant in the Madheshee Movement. Mikrani was also investigated by the Commission for the Investigation of Abuse of Authority (CIAA) in connection with a diplomatic passport scam.
short_description: Nepalese politician and former member of the Constituent Assembly of Nepal.
